review.reviewBody: The Chapssal Dak-gangjeong is so good, the perfect level of spicy sweet, the portions are quite large and last me for days. no matter how many times I've ordered it, it's always consistently deicious. I've tried other places and no one compares.  Get extra rice cakes. Trust  me.

Very generous portion - almost too much but not complaints!

Would recommend cold noodles!

Chicken is delicious (as always) but when ordering their supreme chicken, you really have to add in the extra sauce because they always put so little that the chicken just looks like a regular Yangnyeom. I always have to spend more to get the extra sauce to enjoy the supreme flavour.
The Wang Galbi-Tang is so rich and good with lots of mushrooms. Perfect for when you're feeling under the weather. Seafood Chives Pancake were delicious too.
Best Korean fried chicken in Vancouver. Bit pricey but worth it. Very high quality. Highly recommend.
